siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Freelance Web Developer and InfoSec Enthusiast
siteMetadata.preamble: I am a Software Developer from Philippines.
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: I develop Website and other products that can help improve businesses. And I also provide software consulting to client to help them realize their software needs.
siteMetadata.postamble: Think I can help your project? I'd love to hear from you:

node.html:
This is created for a small company here in the Philippines to track their sales, And to create month audit of their sales.

  • MongoDb
  • Node.Js
  • React.Js
  • Redux

This Web application is created with the Accident Detection Device. This is to track and create monthly reports on the most accident prone areas and the most vehicle type accidents.

  • MongoDB
  • Node.Js
  • Angular
  • Express.Js

This is a Device create with Raspberry pi 3. This automatically send a SOS message to the nearest rescue teams if the user gets caught in an accident.

  • Raspberry pi 3
  • GPS Module
  • Python
  • Sim card reader

From planning to deployment. I make sure that the requirement is met.

  • Robust, scalable, and self-healing
  • Node.js, React.js, Angular, and more
  • Aws: Ec2, RDS, S3
  • Agile, Waterfall
  • Website Maintenace

I excel at complex product development.

I always ensure to work closely with my clients to ensure that the right product specification will be delivered.
I always emphasize the importance of securing the tools and apps we are using. Especially in this era where anything that is connected to the internet is practically "Vulnerable".
